item.title: EP 339 - The US Army Vs. The Giant Of Kandahar
item.itunes:title: The US Army Vs. The Giant Of Kandahar
item.description:
Today we watch what we eat before getting on a plane, and then we fight the giant of Kandahar!

Patreon

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Loss of Pitch Control During Takeoff

Air Midwest Flight 5481

Raytheon (Beechcraft) 1900D, N233YV

Charlotte, North Carolina

January 8, 2003

https://www.ntsb.gov/investigations/AccidentReports/Reports/AAR0401.pdf

 

Air Midwest Flight 5481

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Air_Midwest_Flight_5481

 

Beechcraft 1900

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beechcraft_1900

 

Crash That Killed 21 Appears Tied to Excess Weight and Maintenance Error, Officials Say

https://www.nytimes.com/2003/05/18/us/crash-that-killed-21-appears-tied-excess-weight-maintenance-error-officials-say.html

Obese passengers could have caused plane crash

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/travel/article-590144/Obese-passengers-caused-plane-crash.html

 

Charging fatter people more to fly? It's Samoa Air that should be ashamed

https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2013/apr/03/samoa-air-weight-ticketing-policy?CMP=twt_gu

 

No Joke: Tiny Samoan Airline Will Charge Passengers By Weight

https://www.travelandleisure.com/blogs/no-joke-tiny-samoan-airline-will-charge-passengers-by-weight

 

This Company Wants to Discreetly Weigh Passengers Before Flights to Help Airlines Use Less Fuel

https://www.travelandleisure.com/airlines-airports/fuel-matrix-aims-to-lower-fuel-costs-by-weighing-passengers

 

Bizarre claims US special ops killed 12FT Afghan red-haired biblical 'GIANT'

https://www.dailystar.co.uk/news/weird-news/kandahar-giant-military-nephilim-biblical-16877566

 

Did U.S. Special Forces Kill a Giant in Kandahar?

https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/u-s-special-forces-killed-a-giant-in-kandahar/

 

DOD IDENTIFIES SOLDIERS KILLED IN ORDNANCE DISPOSAL ACCIDENT

https://archive.defense.gov/Releases/Release.aspx?ReleaseID=3307

 

L.A. Marzulli

https://lamarzulli.net/

 

L.A. MARZULLI'S BLOG

https://lamarzulli.wordpress.com/category/l-a-marzullis-daily-update/

 

Acceleration Radio Nov. 7 - Interview with Scott Carpenter: Bigfoot and the Nephilim Connection

https://www.youtube.com/watch?list=PLocR61oySdCHWpSEPUWLM-1XJal_HTfx_&time_continue=1&v=vWBKDb83GRE&feature=emb_logo

 

#1946: L.A. Marzulli

http://americanloons.blogspot.com/2018/01/1946-la-marzulli.html

 

#18 - Giant of Kandahar Afghanistan - Episode 18

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-zp7e8zKk7A

 

Dr. J

http://drjradiolive.com/

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
